text:
Problem 3.2

Relating Angle Measures to Number of Sides in Polygons

Mr. Pulaskiâ€™s class thought that knowing the angle measure of polygons would be useful information to answer questions about shape.

  • Is there a way to predict the angle measure of regular polygons?
  • How can we find the sum of the angles of a polygon? Why is this important?
  • How does the size of an angle affect the shape of the polygon?

Devon thought there might be a pattern relating the angle sum to the number of sides that would work for any polygon.
